TestCase.name: query 1
TestCase.Resource: create materialized view t_select as select * from t;

RwStreamMaterializedView(name=[t_select]) RwStreamExchange(distribution=[RwDistributionTrait{type=HASH_DISTRIBUTED, keys=[0]}], collation=[[]]) RwStreamTableSource(table=[[test_schema, t]], columns=[v1,v2,v3,_row_id])

TestCase.name: query 2
TestCase.Resource: create materialized view T_select_aggregate as select v1, C from ( select v1, v2, count(*) as C from t group by v1, v2);

RwStreamMaterializedView(name=[t_select_aggregate]) RwStreamProject(v1=[$0], c=[$2], v2=[$1]) RwStreamFilter(condition=[<>($2, 0)]) RwStreamAgg(group=[{0, 1}], c=[COUNT()]) RwStreamExchange(distribution=[RwDistributionTrait{type=HASH_DISTRIBUTED, keys=[0, 1]}], collation=[[]]) RwStreamExchange(distribution=[RwDistributionTrait{type=HASH_DISTRIBUTED, keys=[0]}], collation=[[]]) RwStreamTableSource(table=[[test_schema, t]], columns=[v1,v2])

TestCase.name: query 3
TestCase.Resource: create materialized view T_inner_join as select * from t as t1 join t as t2 on t1.v1 = t2.v2;

RwStreamMaterializedView(name=[t_inner_join]) RwStreamHashJoin(condition=[=($0, $5)], joinType=[inner]) RwStreamExchange(distribution=[RwDistributionTrait{type=HASH_DISTRIBUTED, keys=[0]}], collation=[[]]) RwStreamTableSource(table=[[test_schema, t]], columns=[v1,v2,v3,_row_id]) RwStreamExchange(distribution=[RwDistributionTrait{type=HASH_DISTRIBUTED, keys=[1]}], collation=[[]]) RwStreamExchange(distribution=[RwDistributionTrait{type=HASH_DISTRIBUTED, keys=[0]}], collation=[[]]) RwStreamTableSource(table=[[test_schema, t]], columns=[v1,v2,v3,_row_id])

TestCase.name: query 4
TestCase.Resource: create materialized view T_left_join as select * from t as t1 left join t as t2 on t1.v2 = t2.v1;

RwStreamMaterializedView(name=[t_left_join]) RwStreamHashJoin(condition=[=($1, $4)], joinType=[left]) RwStreamExchange(distribution=[RwDistributionTrait{type=HASH_DISTRIBUTED, keys=[1]}], collation=[[]]) RwStreamExchange(distribution=[RwDistributionTrait{type=HASH_DISTRIBUTED, keys=[0]}], collation=[[]]) RwStreamTableSource(table=[[test_schema, t]], columns=[v1,v2,v3,_row_id]) RwStreamExchange(distribution=[RwDistributionTrait{type=HASH_DISTRIBUTED, keys=[0]}], collation=[[]]) RwStreamTableSource(table=[[test_schema, t]], columns=[v1,v2,v3,_row_id])

TestCase.name: query 5
TestCase.Resource: create materialized view T_right_join as select * from t as t1 right join t as t2 on t1.v2 = t2.v1;

RwStreamMaterializedView(name=[t_right_join]) RwStreamHashJoin(condition=[=($1, $4)], joinType=[right]) RwStreamExchange(distribution=[RwDistributionTrait{type=HASH_DISTRIBUTED, keys=[1]}], collation=[[]]) RwStreamExchange(distribution=[RwDistributionTrait{type=HASH_DISTRIBUTED, keys=[0]}], collation=[[]]) RwStreamTableSource(table=[[test_schema, t]], columns=[v1,v2,v3,_row_id]) RwStreamExchange(distribution=[RwDistributionTrait{type=HASH_DISTRIBUTED, keys=[0]}], collation=[[]]) RwStreamTableSource(table=[[test_schema, t]], columns=[v1,v2,v3,_row_id])

TestCase.name: query 6
TestCase.Resource: create materialized view T_full_join as select * from t as t1 full join t as t2 on t1.v2 = t2.v1;

RwStreamMaterializedView(name=[t_full_join]) RwStreamHashJoin(condition=[=($1, $4)], joinType=[full]) RwStreamExchange(distribution=[RwDistributionTrait{type=HASH_DISTRIBUTED, keys=[1]}], collation=[[]]) RwStreamExchange(distribution=[RwDistributionTrait{type=HASH_DISTRIBUTED, keys=[0]}], collation=[[]]) RwStreamTableSource(table=[[test_schema, t]], columns=[v1,v2,v3,_row_id]) RwStreamExchange(distribution=[RwDistributionTrait{type=HASH_DISTRIBUTED, keys=[0]}], collation=[[]]) RwStreamTableSource(table=[[test_schema, t]], columns=[v1,v2,v3,_row_id])

TestCase.name: query 7
TestCase.Resource: create materialized view T_left_group_inner_join as select * from (select v1, v2, count(*) from t group by v1, v2) as t1 join t as t2 on t1.v2 = t2.v1;

RwStreamMaterializedView(name=[t_left_group_inner_join]) RwStreamHashJoin(condition=[=($1, $3)], joinType=[inner]) RwStreamExchange(distribution=[RwDistributionTrait{type=HASH_DISTRIBUTED, keys=[1]}], collation=[[]]) RwStreamFilter(condition=[<>($2, 0)]) RwStreamAgg(group=[{0, 1}], EXPR$2=[COUNT()]) RwStreamExchange(distribution=[RwDistributionTrait{type=HASH_DISTRIBUTED, keys=[0, 1]}], collation=[[]]) RwStreamExchange(distribution=[RwDistributionTrait{type=HASH_DISTRIBUTED, keys=[0]}], collation=[[]]) RwStreamTableSource(table=[[test_schema, t]], columns=[v1,v2]) RwStreamExchange(distribution=[RwDistributionTrait{type=HASH_DISTRIBUTED, keys=[0]}], collation=[[]]) RwStreamTableSource(table=[[test_schema, t]], columns=[v1,v2,v3,_row_id])

TestCase.name: query 8
TestCase.Resource: create materialized view T_left_group_right_group_inner_join as select * from (select v1, v2, count(*) from t group by v1, v2) as t1 join (select v1, v2, avg(v3) from t group by v1, v2) as t2 on t1.v2 = t2.v1;

RwStreamMaterializedView(name=[t_left_group_right_group_inner_join]) RwStreamHashJoin(condition=[=($1, $3)], joinType=[inner]) RwStreamExchange(distribution=[RwDistributionTrait{type=HASH_DISTRIBUTED, keys=[1]}], collation=[[]]) RwStreamFilter(condition=[<>($2, 0)]) RwStreamAgg(group=[{0, 1}], EXPR$2=[COUNT()]) RwStreamExchange(distribution=[RwDistributionTrait{type=HASH_DISTRIBUTED, keys=[0, 1]}], collation=[[]]) RwStreamExchange(distribution=[RwDistributionTrait{type=HASH_DISTRIBUTED, keys=[0]}], collation=[[]]) RwStreamTableSource(table=[[test_schema, t]], columns=[v1,v2]) RwStreamExchange(distribution=[RwDistributionTrait{type=HASH_DISTRIBUTED, keys=[0]}], collation=[[]]) RwStreamProject(v1=[$0], v2=[$1], EXPR$2=[$2]) RwStreamFilter(condition=[<>($3, 0)]) RwStreamAgg(group=[{0, 1}], EXPR$2=[AVG($2)], Row Count=[COUNT()]) RwStreamExchange(distribution=[RwDistributionTrait{type=HASH_DISTRIBUTED, keys=[0, 1]}], collation=[[]]) RwStreamExchange(distribution=[RwDistributionTrait{type=HASH_DISTRIBUTED, keys=[0]}], collation=[[]]) RwStreamTableSource(table=[[test_schema, t]], columns=[v1,v2,v3])

TestCase.name: query 9
TestCase.Resource: create materialized view T_two_condition_inner_join as select * from t as t1 join t as t2 on t1.v1 = t2.v2 and t1.v2 = t2.v1;

RwStreamMaterializedView(name=[t_two_condition_inner_join]) RwStreamHashJoin(condition=[AND(=($0, $5), =($1, $4))], joinType=[inner]) RwStreamExchange(distribution=[RwDistributionTrait{type=HASH_DISTRIBUTED, keys=[0, 1]}], collation=[[]]) RwStreamExchange(distribution=[RwDistributionTrait{type=HASH_DISTRIBUTED, keys=[0]}], collation=[[]]) RwStreamTableSource(table=[[test_schema, t]], columns=[v1,v2,v3,_row_id]) RwStreamExchange(distribution=[RwDistributionTrait{type=HASH_DISTRIBUTED, keys=[0, 1]}], collation=[[]]) RwStreamExchange(distribution=[RwDistributionTrait{type=HASH_DISTRIBUTED, keys=[0]}], collation=[[]]) RwStreamTableSource(table=[[test_schema, t]], columns=[v1,v2,v3,_row_id])

TestCase.name: query 10
TestCase.Resource: create materialized view T_wrong_case_shuffle_agg as select t1.v1 from (select v1, v2, sum(v3) from t group by v1, v2) as t1 join (select v1, v2, avg(v3) from t group by v1, v2) as t2 on t1.v1 = t2.v1;

RwStreamMaterializedView(name=[t_wrong_case_shuffle_agg]) RwStreamProject(v1=[$0], v2=[$1], v10=[$3], v20=[$4]) RwStreamHashJoin(condition=[=($0, $3)], joinType=[inner]) RwStreamExchange(distribution=[RwDistributionTrait{type=HASH_DISTRIBUTED, keys=[0]}], collation=[[]]) RwStreamProject(v1=[$0], v2=[$1], EXPR$2=[$2]) RwStreamFilter(condition=[<>($3, 0)]) RwStreamAgg(group=[{0, 1}], EXPR$2=[SUM($2)], Row Count=[COUNT()]) RwStreamExchange(distribution=[RwDistributionTrait{type=HASH_DISTRIBUTED, keys=[0, 1]}], collation=[[]]) RwStreamExchange(distribution=[RwDistributionTrait{type=HASH_DISTRIBUTED, keys=[0]}], collation=[[]]) RwStreamTableSource(table=[[test_schema, t]], columns=[v1,v2,v3]) RwStreamExchange(distribution=[RwDistributionTrait{type=HASH_DISTRIBUTED, keys=[0]}], collation=[[]]) RwStreamProject(v1=[$0], v2=[$1], EXPR$2=[$2]) RwStreamFilter(condition=[<>($3, 0)]) RwStreamAgg(group=[{0, 1}], EXPR$2=[AVG($2)], Row Count=[COUNT()]) RwStreamExchange(distribution=[RwDistributionTrait{type=HASH_DISTRIBUTED, keys=[0, 1]}], collation=[[]]) RwStreamExchange(distribution=[RwDistributionTrait{type=HASH_DISTRIBUTED, keys=[0]}], collation=[[]]) RwStreamTableSource(table=[[test_schema, t]], columns=[v1,v2,v3])

TestCase.name: query 11
TestCase.Resource: create materialized view T_wrong_case_two_phase_agg as select t1.v1 from (select v1, sum(v3) from t group by v1) as t1 join (select v1, avg(v3) from t group by v1) as t2 on t1.v1 = t2.v1;

RwStreamMaterializedView(name=[t_wrong_case_two_phase_agg]) RwStreamProject(v1=[$0], v10=[$2]) RwStreamHashJoin(condition=[=($0, $2)], joinType=[inner]) RwStreamExchange(distribution=[RwDistributionTrait{type=HASH_DISTRIBUTED, keys=[0]}], collation=[[]]) RwStreamProject(v1=[$0], EXPR$1=[$1]) RwStreamFilter(condition=[<>($2, 0)]) RwStreamAgg(group=[{0}], EXPR$1=[SUM($1)], Row Sum0=[$SUM0($2)]) RwStreamExchange(distribution=[RwDistributionTrait{type=HASH_DISTRIBUTED, keys=[0]}], collation=[[]]) RwStreamProject(v1=[$0], EXPR$1=[$STREAM_NULL_BY_ROW_COUNT($2, $1)], Row Count=[$2]) RwStreamAgg(group=[{0}], EXPR$1=[SUM($1)], Row Count=[COUNT()]) RwStreamExchange(distribution=[RwDistributionTrait{type=HASH_DISTRIBUTED, keys=[0]}], collation=[[]]) RwStreamTableSource(table=[[test_schema, t]], columns=[v1,v3]) RwStreamExchange(distribution=[RwDistributionTrait{type=HASH_DISTRIBUTED, keys=[0]}], collation=[[]]) RwStreamProject(v1=[$0], EXPR$1=[/($1, $2)]) RwStreamFilter(condition=[<>($3, 0)]) RwStreamAgg(group=[{0}], agg#0=[SUM($1)], agg#1=[SUM($2)], Row Sum0=[$SUM0($3)]) RwStreamExchange(distribution=[RwDistributionTrait{type=HASH_DISTRIBUTED, keys=[0]}], collation=[[]]) RwStreamProject(v1=[$0], $f1=[$STREAM_NULL_BY_ROW_COUNT($3, $1)], $f2=[$STREAM_NULL_BY_ROW_COUNT($3, $2)], Row Count=[$3]) RwStreamAgg(group=[{0}], agg#0=[SUM($1)], agg#1=[COUNT($1)], Row Count=[COUNT()]) RwStreamExchange(distribution=[RwDistributionTrait{type=HASH_DISTRIBUTED, keys=[0]}], collation=[[]]) RwStreamTableSource(table=[[test_schema, t]], columns=[v1,v3])
